main event: Two pilots observed three disc-shaped, white objects traveling at tremendous speed and altitude over the coast of Greenland.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5-10 minutes., The objects were described as either spherical or disc-shaped., The pilots were considered highly reliable witnesses with military backgrounds., The objects displayed rapid acceleration and erratic maneuvers., Possible explanations for the sighting included ground illusions and atmospheric anomalies.
witness description: pilots from the United States Atlantic Fleet
